messages.subject: Re: Next Generation..was Definition Please
messages.msgSnippet: LLL(GB) has an Alumni assoc, I m not sure if that s just for Leaders though.  I know what you mean, I have thought of putting together a British attachment
messages.messageBody:
LLL(GB) has an Alumni assoc, I'm not sure if that's just for Leaders though. I know what you mean, I have thought of putting together a British 'attachment' parenting site, but it's not the same as having regular contact with like-minded souls in the flesh, as it were. Especially when one's mother is doing her darndest to instill competitiveness into MY daughters <groan>

Best wishes
Tracy
----- Original Message -----
From: Jenn
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 5:17 PM
Subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Next Generation..was Definition Please


From: "Jenn" <jbecza@...>

There is a email group called attached that I recently subbed to. If anyone
is interested the webpage about the group and the women that owns the list
is:
http://www.getattached.com

-----Original Message-----
From: Campbell & Wyman <brynlee@...>

>I have some friends here who want to start a group called LLL -The Next
>Generation. Our kids are way past the nursing/toddler age, but we find we
>still need support as our parenting is oh so very different. And not just
>different in the educational arena either.
>LisaKK

Yes...I would like that too!!! Let me know if such a group starts .
Brooke in BC
brynlee@...
